  • Constructor Details

    • DotAndBoxClient

      public DotAndBoxClient(InetAddress address, int port) throws IOException
      This is the constructor for the Client.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to connect to
      port - the port to connect to
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentState

      public void setCurrentState(DotAndBoxClient.ClientState state)

    • chooseBot

      public boolean chooseBot()

    • handleDisconnect

      public void handleDisconnect()

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ClientListener listener)
      Adds a listener to the client (a listener is considered a receiver).
      Parameters:
      listener - the particular Listener

    • sendHello

      public void sendHello()
      Send HELLO command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command HELLO to the server socket.

    • handleHello

      public void handleHello(String receivedMsg) throws WrongFormatProtocol
      Handle HELLO command from the server, which is HELLO~. Then print out the help menu and ask the user to perform LOGIN operation.
      Throws:
      WrongFormatProtocol

    • sendLogin

      public void sendLogin(String username)
      Send LOGIN command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command LOGIN to the server socket.

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(String receivedMessage)
      Handle LOGIN command from the server, which is LOGIN. If the user is already logged in (i.e., same name is used to log in), then ask the user to choose another option (or name).

    • setAiTUI

      public void setAiTUI(AiTUI obj)

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()

    • sendList

      public void sendList()
      Send LIST command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command LIST to the server socket.

    • handleList

      public void handleList(String receivedMessage)
      Handle LIST command from the server, which is LIST. Show all the users that are currently logged into the server.

    • sendQueue

      public void sendQueue()
      Send QUEUE command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command QUEUE to the server socket.

    • sendQueueAI

      public void sendQueueAI()
      Send QUEUE command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command QUEUE to the server socket.

    • handleNewGame

      public void handleNewGame(String receivedMessage)
      Handle NEWGAME command from the server, which is NEWGAME~~. Determine a new DotAndBox game with the pre-chosen players.

    • doMove

      public void doMove()
      Send MOVE command to the server socket by delegating to the clientConnection to do its job. ClientConnection will use the sendMessage() method to send the command MOVE to the server socket with an index of that move.

    • handleMove

      public void handleMove(String messageReceived)
      Handle MOVE command from the server, which is MOVE~. Receive the index of the move from server, then place that move to the board.

    • hasMoved

      public boolean hasMoved()

    • submitMove

      public void submitMove()

    • handleGameOver

      public void handleGameOver(String messageReceived)
